abstract: While Google’s biggest regulatory challenge remains in Europe, authorities around the world are investigating its practices, with a report from India’s competition commission its latest problem.
snippet: While Google’s biggest regulatory challenge remains in Europe, authorities around the world are investigating its practices, with a report from India’s competition commission its latest problem.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Google is quickly becoming the company government regulators around the world love to investigate.

headline.main: Google Antitrust Inquiries Spread Over Globe, With India the Latest Problem
headline.print_headline: Google Antitrust Inquiries Spread Over Globe, With India the Latest Problem

byline.original: By Conor Dougherty and Mark Scott
